question: Probably nothing to worry about, but i need reassurance?
question_content: My mom is 47 years old and very healthy.  She runs at least a few miles every day and eats very healthy.  She has no health problems whatsoever.  but, she woke up in the middle of the night last night and she felt nauseaus and had some pain in her arms.  but she changed position to see if that would help and then she said it started to go away.  Now, i'm worried about her having a heart attack lol.  What do you think caused that?

answers.answer_content: That happens to me when I sleep in a odd position I'm not used to you know like sleeping on my side or my arms behind my back. I don't even realise I'm doing it.
